actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines

official_title: To require a study and report regarding the construction and designation of a new interstate highway from Savannah, Georgia, to Knoxville, Tennessee.
short_title: Interstate 3/3rd Infantry Division Highway Initiation Act of 2005

summary.text: Interstate 3/3rd Infantry Division Highway Initiation Act of 2005 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to study and report to the appropriate congressional committees on the steps and estimated funding necessary to designate and construct a new interstate highway (Interstate Route I-3) for the 3rd Infantry Division 6 Highway, from Savannah, Georgia, to Knoxville, Tennessee 7 (formerly the Savannah River Parkway).

titles.title: Interstate 3/3rd Infantry Division Highway Initiation Act of 2005
To require a study and report regarding the construction and designation of a new interstate highway from Savannah, Georgia, to Knoxville, Tennessee.
